description:
go/build: fix build

Presumably something about the very large go/build
doc comment breaks the build constraint parser in
cmd/dist.  I don't feel like debugging C code right now,
so move it into its own file.  If cmd/dist decides doc.go
is not part of the package, it will still build correctly.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=115ebe8a3935 ***

go/build: fix build

Presumably something about the very large go/build
doc comment breaks the build constraint parser in
cmd/dist.  I don't feel like debugging C code right now,
so move it into its own file.  If cmd/dist decides doc.go
is not part of the package, it will still build correctly.

R=golang-dev
TBR=golang-dev
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5722043

Hello golang-dev, golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5722043: go/build: fix build
